title: Estadio Jorge Basadre
text: The Estadio Jorge Basadre, previously known as the Estadio Modelo, is a <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose stadium</a> in <a href="Tacna">Tacna</a>, <a href="Peru">Peru</a> named after historian <a href="Jorge%20Basadre">Jorge Basadre</a>. It is currently used as a <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> stadium in the <a href="Primera%20Division%20Peruana">Primera Division Peruana</a> by <a href="Coronel%20Bolognesi">Coronel Bolognesi</a>. The stadium holds 19,850 people and has 277 individual seats in the western stand, 69 which are for the VIP area. The rest of the stadium has standing terraces. The name was changed when it was renovated for the <a href="Copa%20America%202004">Copa America 2004</a>. It will be used again for the <a href="2019%20FIFA%20U-17%20World%20Cup">2019 FIFA U-17 World Cup</a>.
